property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your psychic creatures that cost 5 or less can't be blocked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MANA REBURST} 4 (You may summon this creature from your mana zone by paying 4.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MANA REBURST} 4 (You may summon this creature from your mana zone by paying 4.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your psychic creatures that cost 5 or less can't be blocked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a spell that has Hyperspatial in its name from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {CHAIN} (When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature that costs less than this creature, you may put it into the battle zone. If you don't, return it to the top of your deck.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Whenever your "Bolmeteus Musha Dragon" attacks, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Olgaiza, Dark Demon of the Evil Fortress

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your opponent's creatures gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Your darkness creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +3000 power. ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, the crossed creature breaks one of your opponent's shields. ■ You may cross this card with a creature that has "Sword Flash" Dragon in its name for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.
